entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:42 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 80 in the morning. High 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
